title: Product
description: Document a product, typically a data product generated by a project

record.title: Metadata
record.tip: Information about the metadata for the product.

record.title: Keywords
record.tip: Terms used to describe the product.

record.title: Extent
record.tip: Information describing the bounds of the product.

record.title: Spatial
record.tip: Information concerning the spatial attributes of the product.

record.title: Lineage
record.tip: Information on the history of the product.

record.title: Taxonomy
record.tip: Information on the taxa associated with the product.

record.title: Constraints
record.tip: Information about constraints applied to the product.

record.title: Associated
record.tip: Other resources with a defined relationship to the product.

record.title: Documents
record.tip: Other documents related to, but not defining, the product.

record.title: Dictionaries
record.tip: Data dictionaries associated with the product.

dictionary.title: Entities
dictionary.tip: Information about entities(tables) and attributes(columns or fields).
